body_html: Ah, the problem is that Assert truncates its arguments at 3 entries by default. The shapes are actually bigger, and presumably shape < size someone in the invisible bit. I'll fix the error message.
body_text: Ah, the problem is that Assert truncates its arguments at 3 entries by default.  The shapes are actually bigger, and presumably shape < size someone in the invisible bit.  I'll fix the error message.
body: Ah, the problem is that `Assert` truncates its arguments at 3 entries by default.  The shapes are actually bigger, and presumably `shape < size` someone in the invisible bit.  I'll fix the error message.
